response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your experience or solve a specific need you have. Given its quality and functionality, I'm confident it's worth more than its face value of $120. Considering its unique features and benefits, I propose we strike a deal at $150. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity for you to enjoy its advantages at a slightly elevated cost. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 150}
